definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pull or pluck up, root out, esp. in Je and later (Ecclus Impf. 3 fs. [[תנתש]] [[נטע]] Sir 3:9; NH = BH; Targum [[נְתַשׁ]] id.; Syr. nta4 tear off, away; Ar. nata4a is loan-wd. Frä:137);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְנׇתַשׁ]] consec. 1Ki 14:l5; 2 fs. [[נׇתַשְׁתְּ]] Ps 9:7, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַיִּתְּשֵׁם]] De 29:27; 1 S. [[אֶתּשׁ]] Je 12:14, [[אֶתּוֹשׁ]] Je 24:6, Je 42:10; Inf. abs. [[נׇתוֹשׁ]] Je 12:17; cstr. [[לִנְתַוֹשׁ]] Je 1:10, Je 18:7, [[לִנְתשׁ]] Je 31:28 (on [[תַ]] v. Ges:§ 45 g); sf. [[נׇתְשִׁי]] Je 12:15; Pt. act. [[נׁתֵשׁ]] Je 45:4, sf. [[נׁתְשָׁם]] Je 12:14; —pull or pluck up, c. acc. Asherim Mic 5:13 ([[מִקִּרְבְֶָּ]]); esp. of nation, [[מֵעַל]] ´[[אֶת־יִשׂ]] ´[[וְנ]] [[הָאֲדָמָה]] 1Ki 14:15, so De 29:27, Je 12:14, 2Ch 7:20; [[אֶתּשׁ מִתּוֹכָם]] Je 12:14; without ´[[מֵעַל וְגו]] Je 12:15, Je 12:17; opp. [[נׇטַע]] Je 45:4; obj. om. Je 24:6, Je 42:10 (both opp. [[נׇטַע]]); so inf. abs. [[נׇתוֹשׁ וְאַבֵּד]] Je 12:17; inf. cstr. [[לִנְתַוֹשׁ]] Je 1:10 = Je 18:7 cf. Je 31:28 (v. [[נתץ]]

definitions.title: Qal 2 a
definitions.body: ); once of cities ´[[עָרִים נ]] Ps 9:7 thou hast uprooted cities.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִנׇּתֵשׁ]] Je 31:40 it shall not be rooted up (‖[[יֵהָרֵס]], ref. to the city Jerus.); 3 fs. [[תִּנׇּתֵשׁ]] Da 11:4 of kingdom; 3 mpl. [[יִנׇּֽתְשׁוּ מֵעַל אַדְמָתָם]] Am 9:15 (of Isr.; opp. [[נׇטַע]]).—For [[יִנׇּֽתְשׁוּ]] Je 18:14 rd. [[יִנׇּֽשְׁתוּ]] √ [[נשׁת]] q. v.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתֻּתַּשׁ]] Ez Eze 19:12 and she was rooted up (of Isr., under fig. of vine).
